title: The Left Finally Admits The Deep State Is Real (Ep 1779)
description:
In this episode, I address the media finally admitting that the deep state is real. I also address some shocking new information about the Uvalde massacre. 

News Picks:


An eye-opening interview with a police officer who was on the scene in Uvalde. 


Biden calls 9mm ‘high-caliber weapons,’ suggests banning them.

Inside the chaotic Biden White House.

They’re still pushing the digital dollar.
